page.title: 10A WALK ROUND BRADLEY
page.content: Just a little distance from the {Pinfold},a triangle of grass there is a small brick barn with slates, not tiles on the roof in an irregular pattern. The first farm you come to is{'Brook {Farm'}and is owned by Mr.Lawton.He owns a plane which he uses for pleasure. The banks become high and sandy as the narrow roads lead up to{Copestake {Farm}owned by the Greets.On either side of the road the fields are mostly arable which contain grain. In two crop fields there is a marshy hollow,shaped in a semi circle.It looks as if it could have been a pond. One semi circle has gone dry and willow trees grow there.In the other one it is still damp and marsh plants grow there including bullrushes. By Claire Joel.
